Home.header: find the place you can call home
Home.sale-description: You know where you want to be? Find the perfect house, apartment or land.
Home.long-description: Looking for a house or apartment for long term rent?
Home.short-description: Need a place to relax at for a few days?

Login.registration-success-message: Registration successful, please log in through the form below.

List.title: Choose property type
List.missing-username: You will need to add a username
List.missing-username-message: Before creating a listing, you will need to add a username. Please click

ListApartment.title: Apartment Information
ListApartment.ad-title-desc: Ad title up to a maximum of 100 characters.
ListApartment.ad-title-placeholder: Beautiful studio apartment in the city centre
ListApartment.offering-type-desc: Please choose how this apartment will be listed. Multiple options are allowed.
ListApartment.location-desc: Please select the location of the apartment by moving the map until the pointer points to the correct location. You may also search for the location.
ListApartment.area-desc: Apartment area expressed in square meter (m²).
ListApartment.images-desc: Please upload at least one image of the apartment. Maximum allowed file size is 8MB.
ListApartment.short-term-price-description: Price of the apartment per night in €.
ListApartment.long-term-price-description: Price of the monthly rent in €.
ListApartment.sale-description-description: Description to be shown on the apartment sale page.
ListApartment.short-term-rent-description: Description to be shown on the apartment short term rent page.
ListApartment.long-term-rent-description: Description to be shown on the apartment long term rent page.
ListApartment.bedroom-count-description: Total number of bedrooms in the apartment.
ListApartment.bathroom-count-description: Total number of bathrooms in the apartment.
ListApartment.parking-count-description: Number of parking spaces which belong to the apartment.
ListApartment.contact-description: Choose members from your company which will be listed as contacts for this listing.
ListApartment.error: Please fix the specified errros before submitting listing.
ListApartment.floor-description: Floor on which the apartmant is. Enter '0' for ground floor.
ListApartment.total-floor-description: If the apartment has more than one floor, enter how much.
ListApartment.building-floor-description: Total amount of floors in the building of the apartment
ListApartment.build-year-description: The year when the apartment was built.
ListApartment.renovation-year-description: The year when the apartment was last renovated.

ErrorCodes.account_not_found: Account with that data was not found
ErrorCodes.missing_offering_type: Please choose at least one offering type!

ListingPage.calculator-description: Using this calculator you may calculate your monthly payment if you decide to buy this property. Please note that this calculation is purely informational and may not be used in any other way. Please contact your bank for more information.
ListingPage.travel-time-description: Check your travel time from this property to your work, store or your favourite beach

ListingsPage.none-found: We couldn't find any listings that match your filter!

AccountPage.enter-username-message: Please enter your username below so that you can may start submitting listings!

CompanyPage.click-here: Click here to create a new company.
CompanyPage.name: Company Name
CompanyPage.members-description: Company members. All members can be listed as contacts when creating a new listing. Registered members can also submit new listings.
CompanyPage.invite-member-description: If the member has an open Imovinko account, enter their e-mail or username to invite them into the company.
CompanyPage.manual-member-description: Manually enter information about a member. This member can then be listed as a contact when submitting a new ad.
CompanyPage.registered-users-2: icon next to their names are registered members.
CompanyPage.success-message: User will recieve notification about the company invite.
CompanyPage.username-or-email: Username or e-mail of the member

CreateCompanyPage.title: Company Information
CreateCompanyPage.name-description: Company name. Please note that this value can not be changed later.
CreateCompanyPage.pin-description: Company Personal Identification Number. Please note that this value can not be changed later.
CreateCompanyPage.web-page-description: If the company has its own website, please fill in the full link to the website here.
CreateCompanyPage.store-name-description: Name of the store which will be shown on company listings. If this field is left empty, the name of the company will be shown instead

CompanyByPrettyIdPage.no-data-message: This company currently has no active listings.

Notifications.invited-you: has invited you to join the company as a member

CalculatorPage.calculator-description: Using this calculator you may calculate your monthly payment based on some input parameters. Please note that this calculation is purely informational and may not be used in any other way. Please contact your bank for more information.

AccountByUsernamePage.user-is-in-company: User is a member of company
AccountByUsernamePage.no-data-message: User has no currently active listings!

MyPropertiesPage.listing-added-messages: Your new listing has been created and can now be seen by anyone!

Contact.contact-us-description: Do you have any questions, ideas or need help with something? Feel free to contact us through the form below!
Contact.sent-description: We have recieved your message and will contact you back as soon as possible!
